official_title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating May 21, 1978 as "National Fallen Heroes Day" and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate May 21, 1978, as "National Fallen Heroes Day."

titles.title: A resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating May 21, 1978 as "National Fallen Heroes Day" and for other purposes.
